summary.para: Gets the current filter as a Unicode string.

param.name: pszFileSpec
param.para: Contains a pointer to the current filter path/file as a Unicode string.

param.name: cchFileSpec
param.para: Specifies the path/file length, in characters.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Called after a specified column is clicked in the interface.

param.name: ppshv
param.para: A pointer to the interface of the hosted view.

param.name: iColumn
param.para: The index of the column clicked.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Called after a specified preview is created in the interface.

param.name: ppshv
param.para: A pointer to the interface of the hosted view.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Extends the capabilities of , and used by the common file dialog boxes when they host a Shell browser.

remarks.para: This interface also provides the methods of the and interfaces, from which it inherits.
A pointer to ICommDlgBrowser3 can be obtained by calling on the object.
